column5: This comfortable suburban home located in a secure gated community is great for a large family or friend's getaway. Easy access to freeways, shopping and tourist attractions and nestled between downtown San Antonio and major theme parks, this large 4 bedroom/ 3 bath house accommodates 8-10 people comfortably. Our extensive DVD library collection, cozy fireplace, outside grill & patio and gourmet kitchen will satisfy all your entertainment needs.
